name: fps-cv-mcp
description: MCP server that serves Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's CV as a resource for AI systems with comprehensive analysis and summarization tools
long_description: A comprehensive MCP Bundle that exposes Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's curriculum vitae through multiple MCP tools and resources. This server provides access to the CV in markdown format, PDF links, Google Scholar profile, and includes sophisticated summarization capabilities with configurable parameters for different audiences and contexts. The server supports both local (stdio) and remote (streamable-http) deployment modes, making it suitable for various integration scenarios.

tools.name: get_cv
tools.description: Retrieve the full CV of Francisco Perez-Sorrosal in markdown format, including educational background, research experience, industry experience, technical skills, and professional achievements

tools.name: get_cv_pdf_link
tools.description: Get the direct link to Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's CV in PDF format for download, viewing, or sharing

tools.name: get_google_scholar_link
tools.description: Get the link to Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's Google Scholar profile with academic publications, citation metrics, and research areas

tools.name: summarize_cv
tools.description: Generate a customizable summary of Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's CV with configurable parameters for depth, context, emphasis, format, audience, length, and tone

tools.name: summarize_cv_for_quick_hiring_screen
tools.description: Generate a brief summary of Francisco Perez-Sorrosal's CV optimized for quick hiring screens with technical-first emphasis and professional tone

tools.name: summarize_cv_for_executive_briefing_for_startup
tools.description: Generate a moderate-depth summary for startup executive briefings with leadership-oriented emphasis and enthusiastic tone in executive summary format

tools.name: summarize_cv_for_executive_briefing_for_big_company
tools.description: Generate a comprehensive summary for big company executive briefings with leadership-oriented emphasis and professional tone in full-page format

prompts.name: summary
prompts.text: Configurable prompt for generating CV summaries with extensive customization options for different use cases and audiences
